description.value: This is Conformance statement for healthapix solution

When the API consumer/developer is trusted partner of API provider, then you access API via OAUTH Client Credential flow or 2 Legged OAUTH model. No end-user consent is required for data access via API. When the API consumer/developer is an untrusted/long tail developer, an end user consent is required for data access via API. This is done through OAUTH Authorization Code flow or 3 Legged OAUTH model.
